column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Eat Neatly

#Text=Eating neatly is a sign that you care about the appearance you are presenting at the table and that you appreciate your food and the effort that someone has gone to in putting the food together .
#Text=Unless you suffer from a disease or you are under the age of 12 years old , you should be able to overcome messy eating habits .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Use your silverware properly .
#Text=Except for some foods ( sandwiches , pizza , etc ; ) you have to use your fork and knife .
#Text=If you are at a fancy restaurant , the salad fork is the small fork and the larger one is for the main course .
#Text=If you are uncertain of these utensils , just watch the host , they should know what they are doing .
#Text=If you are eating certain foods , ( steak , etc ; ) you will have to use a knife .
#Text=Hold the fork in your left hand and the knife in your right .
#Text=Eat slowly .
#Text=This way you can actually have have a conversation with the person you are eating with .
#Text=It also helps you to digest your food properly , which makes you feel more full , so you eat less and become fitter ,
#Text=Stay polite throughout the meal .
#Text=Do n't hog the conversation , chew with your mouth closed and finally , do n't pick at your food .
#Text=Use your napkin .
#Text=Always keep it in your lap , and if somebody tells you that you need to wipe your mouth , do n't get mad about it .
#Text=Just say , " Thank you .
